title: Need this font ID for client. Any help would be great!
content:
Hope I’ve posted this in the right place!  
Need this font ID for client. Any help would be great!  
cheers!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012519/http:/typophile.com/files/font_83.jpg) | 42.69 KB |

 [‹ New York Giants logo font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012519/http:/typophile.com/node/41672 "Go to previous forum topic") [Titling font ID please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012519/http:/typophile.com/node/41704 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jyedsn

comments.content: Not an absolute, exact match (the R has a little flick at the bottom of the tail not present in your sample), but as close as you’re likely to get: [Sculptura](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012519/http:/www.castletype.com/html/tipoteca/sculptura.html).
cheers Mark, Thanks for your time...
